content.html: “We refuse to post our salary, because we don’t want people applying just for the money.” “Ok, cool. What? Oh no, I don’t provide my resume, because I don’t want an employer that’s only interested in my abilities and experience. You understand, right?”
content.value:
“We refuse to post our salary, because we don’t want people applying just for the money.”

“Ok, cool. What? Oh no, I don’t provide my resume, because I don’t want an employer that’s only interested in my abilities and experience. You understand, right?”
